alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 7:59AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 845 AM MST... At 759 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Estrella Sailport, or 16 miles southeast of Goodyear, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Avondale, Goodyear and Rainbow Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument
